prediction_not_found: No prediction article has been written.
miniloto_desc: Mini Loto: Pick 5 out of 31 numbers
switch_loto_type: Switch using the lottery type buttons above!
notify_if_win: "Let me know if you win!" – Tonari
auto_fetch_hint: Select a draw to automatically fetch predictions.
must_select_loto: Please make sure to select the correct draw for the selected lotto.
pwa_guide_iphone: iPhone (Safari): Tap the 'Share' button at the bottom → 'Add to Home Screen'
pwa_guide_android: Android (Chrome): Tap the '︙' menu in the upper right → 'Add to Home Screen'
pwa_guide_pc: PC (Chrome): Use the 'Install' button at the right of the address bar to install as an app
pwa_icon_access: You can access it anytime from the home screen icon just like an app.
pwa_auto_update: * As a PWA, updates are applied automatically.
auto_results: Latest Loto draw results are fetched and updated automatically.
all_free_features: All original features like 'Tonari Zubari Prediction', 'Tonari Diagnosis', and 'Past Results Tool' are free to use.
no_ads_no_account: No ads, no account required. Anyone can use it safely.
accuracy_note: All app data and analytics results are cross-checked with official draw CSVs to ensure top accuracy.
disclaimer:
* This service is provided for data verification and entertainment purposes.
Please make purchase decisions based on your own judgment and responsibility.
blog: Tonari Official Blog (See trends & in-depth predictions here)
note: Tonari Note (Deep insights & paid predictions here)
youtube: Tonari Official YouTube Channel (Also streaming videos!)
desc_notAppeared: Select numbers not drawn in the last 30 draws
desc_appeared: Select numbers with high frequency in last 30 draws
desc_random: Fully random selection from all numbers
desc_odd: A set with many odd numbers (Mini Loto/Loto 6: 4+ odds, Loto 7: 5+ odds)
desc_even: A set with many even numbers (Mini Loto/Loto 6: 4+ evens, Loto 7: 5+ evens)
desc_balanced: A set with an even balance of odd and even numbers (Loto 6 only)
desc_consecutive: A set including consecutive numbers (e.g. 24, 25, etc).
desc_sameLast: A set including multiple numbers with the same last digit (e.g. 11, 21, 31, etc).
desc_lowZone: A set with many numbers in 01–09 (less than 10).
desc_midZone: A set with many middle zone numbers: Mini Loto: 10–20 / Loto 6: 10–30 / Loto 7: 10–24.
desc_highZone: A set with many high zone numbers: Mini Loto: 21–31 / Loto 6: 31–43 / Loto 7: 25–37.
desc_spread: A set that includes at least one number from each zone.
desc_narrowRange: A set with a small range between the smallest and largest number.
desc_wideRange: A set with a large range between the smallest and largest number.
desc_lastDup: A set that shares at least one number with the previous draw.
desc_lastUnique: A set that shares no numbers with the previous draw.
desc_sumSmall: A set with a low sum (Mini Loto: <60, Loto 6: <114, Loto 7: <160, etc.)
desc_sumLarge: A set with a high sum (Mini Loto: ≥80, Loto 6: >151, Loto 7: ≥160, etc.)
desc_birthday: A set made up of only numbers 1–31.
desc_with_consecutive_numbers: A set including consecutive numbers (e.g. 24, 25, etc).
desc_with_same_last_digit: A set including multiple numbers with the same last digit (e.g. 11, 21, 31, etc).
desc_odd_heavy: A set with 4 or more odd numbers.
desc_even_heavy: A set with 4 or more even numbers.
desc_low_sum: A set where the main numbers sum to less than 60.
desc_high_sum: A set where the main numbers sum to 80 or higher.
desc_balanced: A set with an even balance of odd and even numbers.
desc_odd_heavy_loto6: A set with 4 or more odd numbers (Loto 6).
desc_even_heavy_loto6: A set with 4 or more even numbers (Loto 6).
desc_low_sum_loto6: A set where the 6 main numbers sum to less than 114.
desc_high_sum_loto6: A set where the 6 main numbers sum to more than 151.
desc_odd_heavy_loto7: A set with 5 or more odd numbers (Loto 7).
desc_even_heavy_loto7: A set with 5 or more even numbers (Loto 7).
desc_low_sum_loto7: A set where the 7 main numbers sum to less than 160.
desc_high_sum_loto7: A set where the 7 main numbers sum to 160 or higher.
desc_high_low_mix: A set containing both numbers below 10 and above 30.
過去30回で未出現の数字から抽出: Select numbers not drawn in the last 30 draws
直近30回で出現頻度が高い数字から抽出: Select numbers with high frequency in last 30 draws
完全無作為（すべての数字からランダム抽出）: Fully random selection from all numbers
下一桁が同じ数字（例:11,21など）が複数含まれる: Multiple numbers with same last digit (e.g. 11, 21, etc.)
最小ゾーン（1〜9）の数字を多めに選ぶ: Choose more numbers from the lowest zone (1–9)
中央ゾーンの数字多め: More numbers from the middle zone
最大ゾーン（例：ロト6は31〜43など）多め: More numbers from highest zone (e.g. Loto 6: 31–43)
各ゾーンから最低1つは必ず選ぶ: At least one from each zone
最小～最大のレンジが小さい構成: Small range between min and max numbers
最小～最大のレンジが大きい構成: Large range between min and max numbers
前回当選数字と1つ以上重複: At least 1 number overlaps with previous draw
前回当選数字と1つも重複しない: No numbers overlap with previous draw
連番アタック！流れに乗る日は大きく当たる日。: Consecutive number attack! When the flow is right, it's a big win day.
連続数字が熱い！波に乗れそうな予感。: Consecutive numbers are hot! Feels like a good wave.
連番多め。勢い重視のギャンブラー型診断！: Many consecutive numbers. For gamblers who love momentum!
全て奇数！波乱の予感漂うアグレッシブ診断。: All odds! Aggressive, with a sense of unpredictability.
オッズ型フルスロットル！攻めの日です。: Full throttle odd type! Time to attack.
偶数オンリー。落ち着いた構成で勝負！: Only evens. Calm and steady wins!
奇数偶数バランス型。大穴狙いでも鉄板狙いでもイケる！: Odd/even balanced. Great for both bold and safe bets!
低位ゾーンに集中。地に足ついた堅実型！: Concentrated in low zone. Down-to-earth and steady.
1ケタばかりの慎重派。小さな当たりも積み重ね！: Lots of single digits. Small wins add up!
高位ゾーンで夢を見ろ！一発逆転狙いの攻め型。: Dream big with high numbers! Go for a comeback!
高位ゾーン中心のジャンボ狙い。: Jumbo win target with high numbers.
数字のまとまり感がスゴい！結束力バツグン。: Numbers are tightly grouped! Superb unity.
広範囲カバー型。どこからでも“当たり”を拾いに行ける！: Wide range. Can catch a win from anywhere!
ばらけている時こそ、意外な一発に期待！: When spread out, expect the unexpected!
今日は完全ランダム型。こういう時こそ神頼み！: Today is completely random. Time to rely on luck!
今日の運勢はガチャガチャ仕様です。: Today's fortune is like a capsule toy.
